Text:
One day, Beta and Epsilon find themselves at the
Shadow Garden's hideout.
That reminds me, Beta...
What is it?

I heard from Nu that Lady Alpha once infiltrated an
academy.
Lady Alpha, too?! When did that happen?

I'm not sure if it was Midgar Academy, but there's no
doubt she spent some time pretending to be a student.
I'm so jealous...

We have our public personas, so we're not suited for
infiltrating the Academy.

Ack. I would be willing to risk it for that sweet
campus life with Master Shadow...

You mustn't say that. I'm painfully aware of how you
feel, but we're the only ones capable of completing
our own missions.
*sigh* I guess that's true...

Lady Alpha as a student... I wonder how she acted.
Just the idea makes my imagination run wild.

She probably was her usual cool self. You know,
like...
Hey there, cutie! Are you on your way home?
Hey, are you listening? Wanna hang out?
Not interested.
Aww, but you're not doing anything, are you?
Don't put me in the same boat as you. Bye.
Whoa, too cool for school, huh? But...I like that!
...Something like that?

...That does sound like Lady Alpha. But that could be
problematic.
Problematic, how?

Well, if she were so prickly, she wouldn't be able to
fit in with the rest of the class, right? How would
she be able to gather intel while being undercover?
Ugh, you're right...

Lady Alpha always takes her duties seriously.
I'm sure she'd pull off any role perfectly.

Lady Alpha would...yes...play the role of the
target's ideal girl.
So, she'd be a little more cheerful than usual...
Morning, seat neighbor.
Huh? Oh...Alpha. M-Morning.

Did I catch you by surprise? Sorry about that. I got
curious, seeing you so engrossed in that book.
What are you reading?
Oh, Natsume's new book.
Wow! I'm also a huge fan of her writing!
Really? So you've read her first book as well?
Of course. I've read all of her books.

Oh, but not her latest one. It's so popular that I
still haven't managed to get my hands on a copy...

You know, I've got a copy...! If you'd like...
I-I could lend it to you.
Really?! Thank you!
N-Not at all! I'll bring it tomorrow!
...How does that sound?

I see. Sounds convincing...although I'm not a big fan
of how you used your own books to break the ice.

...Did you have to throw in that last bit? Anyway,
I'm sure if Lady Alpha put in even the slightest
effort, she could easily make a boy her age
So! What happened next between the two of them?
What? Th-That was just a fictional example...
Never mind that!
Huh?

Two seemingly incompatible individuals bond over
a shared interest...and thus their youth begins!
Yes, in other words, this is their "Prelude to Youth"!

I'll even overlook you using your own novels as an
ice breaker!
But I'm the one who came up with the story...
Just tell me what happens next.

Well, let's see...hmmm... It's a bit harder now that
you've raised the bar...

Oh come on! You're overthinking it! If it were me...
it would go something like this...
Morning, seat neighbor.
Oh...Alpha! M-Morning!
I brought Natsume's new book you wanted to read!
Thanks! I've been dying to read it!
I have it here in my bag...wait, huh...?
What's the matter? Did you forget to bring it?

S-Sorry! I must've left it at home! I'll go back and
get it now!

Don't worry about it. Oh...I can come by your house
to pick it up if you'd like. It seems we live near each
other.
H-Huh?! I-I don't mind, but...!

Alright, then, let's go home together. Heheh.
I'm looking forward to it.
...Something like that?

...So good! Do they go home together then?! What an
oblivious boy!
R-Right?

Not only that, but the boy's father is actually
involved with the Cult. Lady Alpha discovered
this. That's why she got close to the boy...yes?

No... What a heart-wrenching development! Lady Alpha
was gathering intel to uncover her target's weakness.
It was all part of her plan...

Gathering intel was Lady Alpha's true intent...
She was willing to use any means to destroy
the Cult...

What will be the fate of the two who were never meant
to be together
You two seem to be having fun.
Aaaah!
Wha?!
The real...Lady Alpha...?
Who else would I be? I just got back from my mission.
Welcome back... Hahah...

You two seemed like you were enjoying yourselves.
I thought I heard you mention my name, or was it
just my imagination?
Huh?!
Oh! Y-You must've imagined it!
At least try and lie more convincingly.
Ulp...

Beta. You haven't put out a new novel in some time,
have you?
Urk... No...

Epsilon. You're overseeing cleaning duties this
month, yes? Or have you finished already?
Urk... No...

Chatting is fine, but save it for after you've
completed your tasks. Understood?
...That sounds more like the Lady Alpha I know.
Did you say something?
N-Nothing! Let's go, Epsilon!
L-Let's!
Seriously... I'm glad they get along so well, but...

Alpha shrugs her shoulders as Beta and Epsilon
dash off.
